text: aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane tumhen zameen mein (apana) naayab banaaya aur tumamen se baaz ke baaz par darje buland kiye taaki vo (neamat) tumhen dee hai usee par tumhaara imatehaan kare usamen to shak hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar bahut jald azaab karane vaala hai aur isamen bhee shak nahin ki vah bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
